attributes.action: Ban russian products from all supermarkets in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
It is totally unacceptable that there are till plenty of Russian goods on the shelves of supermarkets all over the UK. 

I call for the UK government to ban the sale of russian products from all UK supermarkets immediately.
attributes.background: Russia has invaded Ukraine and is responsible for the death of Ukrainian militarary personnel and civilian population that include children. More over, Russian military is destroying property of Ukrainian citizens and infrastructure projects that are critical for peoples safety.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
